name: Strength Through Common Suffering CD
description:
ILL CONTENT "Strength Through Common Suffering" CD

1. Empty World
2. Ill Content
3. Promise of the Grave
4. Broken
5. Just For Today
6. I'm Your Mistake
7. My Fist Your Face
8. The Shadow
9. Endless Pain

Limited to 500 copies, hand-numbered
FREE SHIPPING

*** We prefer you use your PAYPAL account, also accepts credit/debit cards ***

Album Info:
* Album released March 2012
* Recorded through analog at House of Faith Studios by Bart Thurber last November 2011.
* Moleek Busby plays the guitars on this recording
* Front cover by Sam Lim of Electric Wasteland Illustrations http://electric-wasteland.blogspot.com/

You can listen to our sound sample and make donations on this link: http://illcontent.bandcamp.com/

Digital copy on this link: 
http://vibedeck.com/illcontent
